name: Badu Rural Welfare Society
briefDescription: The objectives for which the society is established are :1. To establish, acquire, start, aid, run, maintain or manage educational institutes, libraries, for the benefit of the public.2. To setup, run and manage nursery schools, primary schools, secondary and higher secondary schools to be affiliated under Govt. regulatory bodies. Also may establish and run college to promote true education by cultivation of totality among students.3. To set up computer centers, laboratories to spread computer literacy and up gradation of knowledge and skills in the field of computer science and technology.4. To promote awareness about environment and to arrange tree plantation in the localities to combat pollution's and beautification of public places
